QuestData.Title: The Calculator
QuestData.Description: <A gentle wind caresses your face.>$B$BOne more task yet remains.$B$BPathaleon the Calculator oversees many of his master's operations. He is personally responsible for much of the recent torment that has plagued this world.$B$BI ask that you eliminate him.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal has asked you to slay Pathaleon the Calculator in the Mechanar of Tempest Keep.
